name: The Hidden Room
description:
Several popular rumors speak of a hidden treasure somewhere in the home of Tom Barkley, an American archaeologist who moved to Germany. You are looking for the treasure in his house, and after obtaining important information and details about it, you decide to try to recover it.

Roadmap

  • Other languages support
  • Save game support
  • Steam Cloud Saves support
  • Steam Achievements (Available at release on October 14th!)
  • Multiplayer
  • DLC
Note: The roadmap may be subject to change
